id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.

*See also: [STS3X Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sts3x.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
**[Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval to check the sensor. Defaults to `60s`.

*See also: [STS3X Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sts3x.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I²C address of the sensor. Defaults to `0x4A`.

*See also: [STS3X Temperature Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/sts3x.html#configuration-variables)*
